version_description:
New in this Update:
1.Diamond Chest Tickets added to Store
2.Adjusted difficulty of stages in Chapters 1-5
3.Fixed bug causing screen to become blurry on some Android Devices
4.Fixed some bugs causing game to crash and other minor bugs

***Like us on Facebook: Soul Hunters Global!

New in this Update:
1.Diamond Chest Tickets added to Store
2.Adjusted difficulty of stages in Chapters 1-5
3.Fixed bug causing screen to become blurry on some Android Devices
4.Fixed some bugs causing game to crash and other minor bugs

***Like us on Facebook: Soul Hunters Global!

New this update:
1.Added Goblin Peddler
2.Added Guild Message Feature for Guild Masters
3.Added more items to Trader
4.Added new Orange and Purple items to Diamond Chest and removed 1-Star Hero Cards from Diamond Chest
5.2-Star Hero cards and Purple items added to Gold Chest
6.Better items added to chests in Crucible of Fire

New this update:
1.Added Goblin Peddler
2.Added Guild Message Feature for Guild Masters
3.Added more items to Trader
4.Added new Orange and Purple items to Diamond Chest and removed 1-Star Hero Cards from Diamond Chest
5.2-Star Hero cards and Purple items added to Gold Chest
6.Better items added to chests in Crucible of Fire

- Blind Arena Event
- Now available in Diamond Chest: Goblin Squad, Mirielle

- Added countdown timer for free weekly use of Conjuring Stone for players VIP 10 and up
- Added “Rules” button to the Jade exchange interface
- Added confirmation popup window for 10 uses of Conjuring Stone and 10 opens of Diamond Chest
- Added voices for Orkon and Goblin Squad
- Fixed bug causing Guild Points earned in a new Guild to be accumulated by old Guild.
- Fixed bug causing event countdown timer to display negative numbers
- Fixed bug showing incorrect online status of guildmates in Mystic Ruins

Added New Hero: Batman
Added New Hero: Batman

Heroes and Awakening Quests
● New Awakening Quests: Valan, Chrona

Features
● Added 16th level in the Sky Fortress

Bug Fixes:
● Added Cards for Awakened Boreas and Tashi
● Improved various translations

Heroes and Awakening Quests
● New Awakening Quests: Valan, Chrona

Features
● Added 16th level in the Sky Fortress

Bug Fixes:
● Added Cards for Awakened Boreas and Tashi
● Improved various translations

Heroes
● Added New Login Hero：Gromok
● New Conjuring Stone Hero：Ulaos
● New Hero Awakening：Tareth
● Diamond Chest：Added Kasar and Magnus
● Removed From Diamond Chest：Valan, Esabel, Gus, Elric, Radulf, Ember, Optos, Magdor, Mog
● Hero Choice Chest：Removed Petros
● Crucible Supply Wagon：Added Petros
● Crucible Supply Wagon：Removed Ulfang, Radulf, Mog
● Arena Armory：Removed Soren, Valan, Esabel
● Guild Emporium：Removed Slim, Firehawk, Dina
● Legendary Shop：Removed Optos, Malrath, Gus
● Gladiator's Shop：Removed Baltor, Magdor
Notice：As some heroes are achievable via stages we’ve removed them from the above stores in order to provide a better experience at the stores.

Hero Balance and Adjustments
● Aquaman: Increased the base damage for the abilities “Stormy Seas” and “Water Blast”
● Increased the Physical Attack Growth for Aquaman

Features and Optimizations
● Increased the amount purple pet eggs for the September login rewards.
● Added two new levels to the Sky Fortress
● Increased the chances of receiving double the amount of Soulstones from Marvelous Gift Boxes
● Optimized retrieval of awakening gear. Players can now choose which stage the gear will be dropped in.
● Daily Quest Adjustments
● A batch of chests can now be opened all in one go.
● You can now find Gaia Stone fragments within the highest difficulty of the The Tidal Temple
● Crystal will now drop in the highest difficulty of The Dwarven Forge
● Optimized the English description for Lama’s ultimate ability.
● Added optimized translations for several languages.

Bug Fixes
● Fixed an issue at the Prophecy Pool and Dojo that caused gear to be displayed incorrectly.
● Fixed a display issue for Aquaman’s avatar frame.
● Fixed a problem where the words “Fighting” would be displayed in some circumstances on guild stages.
● Fixed a problem where Glacia would sometimes cause a battle to freeze.
● Fixed an abnormality in Lumos’ awakening quest description.

Heroes
● Added New Login Hero：Gromok
● New Conjuring Stone Hero：Ulaos
● New Hero Awakening：Tareth
● Diamond Chest：Added Kasar and Magnus
● Removed From Diamond Chest：Valan, Esabel, Gus, Elric, Radulf, Ember, Optos, Magdor, Mog
● Hero Choice Chest：Removed Petros
● Crucible Supply Wagon：Added Petros
● Crucible Supply Wagon：Removed Ulfang, Radulf, Mog
● Arena Armory：Removed Soren, Valan, Esabel
● Guild Emporium：Removed Slim, Firehawk, Dina
● Legendary Shop：Removed Optos, Malrath, Gus
● Gladiator's Shop：Removed Baltor, Magdor
Notice：As some heroes are achievable via stages we’ve removed them from the above stores in order to provide a better experience at the stores.

Hero Balance and Adjustments
● Aquaman: Increased the base damage for the abilities “Stormy Seas” and “Water Blast”
● Increased the Physical Attack Growth for Aquaman

Features and Optimizations
● Increased the amount purple pet eggs for the September login rewards.
● Added two new levels to the Sky Fortress
● Increased the chances of receiving double the amount of Soulstones from Marvelous Gift Boxes
● Optimized retrieval of awakening gear. Players can now choose which stage the gear will be dropped in.
● Daily Quest Adjustments
● A batch of chests can now be opened all in one go.
● You can now find Gaia Stone fragments within the highest difficulty of the The Tidal Temple
● Crystal will now drop in the highest difficulty of The Dwarven Forge
● Optimized the English description for Lama’s ultimate ability.
● Added optimized translations for several languages.

Bug Fixes
● Fixed an issue at the Prophecy Pool and Dojo that caused gear to be displayed incorrectly.
● Fixed a display issue for Aquaman’s avatar frame.
● Fixed a problem where the words “Fighting” would be displayed in some circumstances on guild stages.
● Fixed a problem where Glacia would sometimes cause a battle to freeze.
● Fixed an abnormality in Lumos’ awakening quest description.
fixed bugs.
fixed bugs.

Heroes & Pets
● New DC Hero: Green Lantern
● New Conjuring Stone Hero: Malax
● New Hero Awakenings: Musashi & Flora
● New Hero Skin: Lama
● New Purple Pet: Corvus

Functions
● New rune set. Only heroes that are Red +1 can adorn the rune set
● Added a 30th floor to the Sky Fortress
● Adjusted maximum stamina levels for heroes between levels 91 - 100.
● Adjusted the stage difficulty for Chapters 18, 19 normal and heroic stages.
● New "Collection" function added to the battle preparation UI.
● Optimized the heroes for hire interface.
● Added 6 slots to the Gobblin Peddler's store.
● Orange Pet Equipment Box can now be purchased from the Goblin Peddler.
● Guild Masters and Guild Elders will now have a red spot appear as a Guild War reminder during times of war.
● Maximum amount of Guild Points increased from 200,000 to 300,000.
● Added red equipment to the Guild War's Arsenal.
● Added pet equipment and red equipment to the Workshop
● Players over level 100 have a chance to receive pet equipment and red equipment in the last box of the Crucible.
● New red spot reward reminder added to weeklies that will appear after completing a weekly quest.
● Adjusted maximum of gold that can be held.
● Added a search function to the bag.
● Increased drop rate of equipment in Chapter 19 raid dungeons.
● You can now check detailed information about other players' heroes in the Arena, Gladiator's Arena and leader board.
● Added a fast battle function to the Treasure Cave.
● Optimized language descriptions.

Bug Fixes
● Fixed a bug that would occur with Tsuki's ultimate when used in conjunction with Glacia.
● Fixed a bug that would cause health regeneration to become abnormal while Glacia was in the Prophecy Pool.
● Fixed a bug that would sometimes cause Batman's animation to be incorrectly displayed.
● Fixed a bug that would cause Cara to lose health for no reason at the beginning of a battle.
● Fixed a bug that would cause Vincent's ultimate ability to be cast in the wrong direction.
● Fixed a bug that would cause The Flash to be forced off of the battlefield by Vernos.
● Fixed a bug that would cause Optos to become unable to cause damage to Osiris in the Hall of Legends due to distance.
● Fixed an issue that would happen on the 11th floor of the Sky Fortress when using multiple heroes.
● Fixed an issue that allowed some players to exceed the maximum player level on certain servers.
● Fixed an anomaly within Chapter 14's raid boss battle.
● Fixed a bug that caused the wrong items to be dropped within Chapter 19.
● Fixed a problem that would cause some player's monthly cards to display the incorrect time.
● Fixed a bug that would cause some heroes to be unable to tested.

Heroes & Pets
● New DC Hero: Green Lantern
● New Conjuring Stone Hero: Malax
● New Hero Awakenings: Musashi & Flora
● New Hero Skin: Lama
● New Purple Pet: Corvus

Functions
● New rune set. Only heroes that are Red +1 can adorn the rune set
● Added a 30th floor to the Sky Fortress
● Adjusted maximum stamina levels for heroes between levels 91 - 100.
● Adjusted the stage difficulty for Chapters 18, 19 normal and heroic stages.
● New "Collection" function added to the battle preparation UI.
● Optimized the heroes for hire interface.
● Added 6 slots to the Gobblin Peddler's store.
● Orange Pet Equipment Box can now be purchased from the Goblin Peddler.
● Guild Masters and Guild Elders will now have a red spot appear as a Guild War reminder during times of war.
● Maximum amount of Guild Points increased from 200,000 to 300,000.
● Added red equipment to the Guild War's Arsenal.
● Added pet equipment and red equipment to the Workshop
● Players over level 100 have a chance to receive pet equipment and red equipment in the last box of the Crucible.
● New red spot reward reminder added to weeklies that will appear after completing a weekly quest.
● Adjusted maximum of gold that can be held.
● Added a search function to the bag.
● Increased drop rate of equipment in Chapter 19 raid dungeons.
● You can now check detailed information about other players' heroes in the Arena, Gladiator's Arena and leader board.
● Added a fast battle function to the Treasure Cave.
● Optimized language descriptions.

Bug Fixes
● Fixed a bug that would occur with Tsuki's ultimate when used in conjunction with Glacia.
● Fixed a bug that would cause health regeneration to become abnormal while Glacia was in the Prophecy Pool.
● Fixed a bug that would sometimes cause Batman's animation to be incorrectly displayed.
● Fixed a bug that would cause Cara to lose health for no reason at the beginning of a battle.
● Fixed a bug that would cause Vincent's ultimate ability to be cast in the wrong direction.
● Fixed a bug that would cause The Flash to be forced off of the battlefield by Vernos.
● Fixed a bug that would cause Optos to become unable to cause damage to Osiris in the Hall of Legends due to distance.
● Fixed an issue that would happen on the 11th floor of the Sky Fortress when using multiple heroes.
● Fixed an issue that allowed some players to exceed the maximum player level on certain servers.
● Fixed an anomaly within Chapter 14's raid boss battle.
● Fixed a bug that caused the wrong items to be dropped within Chapter 19.
● Fixed a problem that would cause some player's monthly cards to display the incorrect time.
● Fixed a bug that would cause some heroes to be unable to tested.

Heroes

- Added two new heroes: Adus, Rakash
- New Hero Skin: Malrath's Mettle

Heroes

- Added two new heroes: Adus, Rakash
- New Hero Skin: Malrath's Mettle
